description: Tynwald members fail to reach agreement on a call to introduce more 20mph and 30mph speed limits.
title: Bid to introduce more speed limits on Isle of Man stalls
title_page: Bid to introduce more speed limits on Isle of Man stalls - BBC News
maintext: Mr Shimmins said the current speed limits had led to "children unable to play out or walk to school" and "elderly folk who can't cross the road outside their home".
